com.esri.mo2.file.shp
Class DbfRecord

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.file.shp.DbfRecord
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class DbfRecord
extends Object
implements Cloneable

This class holds the record data for a dbf file. For a list of objects returned and accepted by each field type, please refer to the DbfField class and related subclasses.

See Also:
DbfField

Field Summary
static int DELETED
          indicates that the requested record has been marked for deletion
static int IOERROR
          indicates that an I/O error has occured while processing the record
static int NEW
          indicates that the record is new
static int OK
          indicates the no errors occured while accessing the record
static int PASTEOF
          indicates that an attempt was made to read past the current end of the file

public Object[] getValues()
